Room.Name: Necropolis Circle
Room.ShortDescription: The path splits to the southeast and southwest, around the fountain.
Room.LongDescription: It wasn't this cold when you entered the gate, but a suddenly you are aware of a chill breeze and light mist that has settled on you. This place is very quiet. There are no birds nor crickets, and all you can hear is the soft sound of your boots on the gravel. In the distance to the south there is also a sound of gentle splashing from the fountain you see there.
